item.title: Twitter Sentiment Analysis with R
item.description: Sentiment Analysis Sentiment Analysis Sentiment analysis gives us insight into the things that automate mining of attitudes, opinions, views and emotions from text, speech, tweets and database sources.

item.title: Dealing with missing data in R; Best Practices
item.description: This is a living document where I will be compiling what I consider best practices when it comes to dealing with misssing data. The idea is to prepare an optimized checklist
